title: LF Diamond+ Top Laner for Competitive OOL Team
body:
Looking for a Diamond 4+ Top laner for a competitive OOL team.

Current members range from Diamond 4 to Challenger.

Requirements are pretty standard.
- Diamond 4+
- Available 3-4 nights a week for scrims
- Available every 2nd Saturday & Sunday for OOL
- Working mic & Stable internet connection

Add: PowPowPanda in-game to discuss.
